name: Eggplant's Dynamic Chimerization
description:
An eggplant with mustache, that's you. You've stolen a magic crystal that is randomly switching you in a form of what you see around. For this stealing you were sent to a magical Island, whose habitants are always confront each other. Try to survive and find the way out!

How to play:
- Use the arrow buttons to move.
- Shift to shift your shape.
- Transform to the most safe form for every moment!
